text: Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke Allah ke aagey sar-ba-sujood hain woh sab jo aasmano mein hain aur jo zameen mein hain, Suraj aur chand aur taarey aur pahad aur darakht aur jaanwar aur bahut se Insaan aur bahut se woh log bhi jo azaab ke mustahiq ho chuke hain? aur jisey Allah zaleel-o-khwar karde usey phir koi izzat dene wala nahin hai. Allah karta hai jo kuch chahta hai
